Text:
hey the best mac software is mactheripper for getting movies from DVD to your Hard Drive but im going to be honest with you, the best thing you can do is get your shiny new mac a dose of Windows 7...go to applications>utilities>bootcamp and follow the instructions to install windows on your mac...then from there get yourself a copy of CCE, DVD-RB Pro+RBOpt and DVDRemake (if you already dont have them)

by the way, if you dont want windows on your mac (believe me i dont but its the best DVD software out there is for windows), here is the website for mactheripper:   http://www.ripdifferent.com/forum/index.php

you need to register and figure out how to send a gift and get the latest release which i think is like 4.1...hope this helps
so you get things figured out
do you use windows for torrents at all or do you just use windows to work the dvd and process it?
